<title level="1" right="Focus 7" pfs="Standard">
[Litany of Righteousness](/Spells.aspx?ID=398)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
<trait label="Litany" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=102" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 388 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature that isn't holy
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

Your litany denounces an evildoer, rendering it susceptible to the powers of good. The target gains weakness 7 to holy. The target then becomes temporarily immune to all of your litanies for 1 minute.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The weakness increases by 1.
name: Litany of Righteousness
